definition: phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common

sentences.english: Tomato, mozzerella, basil, olive tepanade drizzle.
sentences.chinese: 蕃茄，奶汁食品，罗勒，青果碎。

sentences.english: Maruko: To go. Would you give me some ketchup?
sentences.chinese: 外带。可以给我一些蕃茄酱吗？

sentences.english: Can I have a glass of tomato juice?
sentences.chinese: 可以给我一杯蕃茄汁吗？

sentences.english: We planted green beans and tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 我们也种了四季豆和蕃茄。

sentences.english: Keep a vegetable garden with lots of nice tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 用漂亮的蕃茄来修饰你的蔬菜园。

sentences.english: Fusilli(Organic) with Tuna, Tomato, Cauliflower &Cream Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 吞拿鱼，蕃茄，椰菜花有机螺丝粉配忌廉汁。

sentences.english: She likes to eat French fries with ketchup.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢吃薯条时配蕃茄酱。

sentences.english: They all come with mustard and ketchup.
sentences.chinese: 汉堡都加了芥茉和蕃茄酱。

sentences.english: There are many kinds of tomato juice in the supermarket now.
sentences.chinese: 现在超级市场有许多种的蕃茄汁。

sentences.english: And can I have some mustard and ketchup, too?
sentences.chinese: 我可以再来一点芥茉和蕃茄酱吗？

sentences.english: Many children like to eat hamburger with tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 很多孩子喜欢吃加有蕃茄酱的汉堡。

sentences.english: Can you believe it, he even puts  catchup on his ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 你信不信，他吃冰淇淋的时候竟然还要加蕃茄酱。
蕃茄汤，先生，面包碎片，请。

sentences.english: Penne with Turkey, Broccoli, Tomato &Cream Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 火鸡，蕃茄，西兰花尖通粉配忌廉汁。

sentences.english: The equivalent amount of canned tomatoes is often under $1.
sentences.chinese: 而等量的罐头蕃茄往往不足1美元。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
cabbage/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]/Taiwan pr. [gao1 li4 cai4]
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
